1 import cv2
2 import numpy as np
3 
4 
5 class CalibrationObject:
6  """
7  Class containing intrinsic parameters of the camera used
8  """
9 
10  def __init__(self, mtx, dist):
11  self.__mtx = mtx
12  self.__dist = dist
13 
14  self.__fx = self.__mtx[0][0]
15  self.__fy = self.__mtx[1][1]
16  self.__cx = self.__mtx[0][2]
17  self.__cy = self.__mtx[1][2]
18 
19  @classmethod
20  def set_from_values(cls, mtx, dist):
21  return cls(mtx, dist)
22 
23  @classmethod
24  def set_from_yaml(cls, yaml_file):
25  mtx = np.reshape(yaml_file["mtx"], (3, 3))
26  dist = np.expand_dims(yaml_file["dist"], axis=0)
27  return cls(mtx, dist)
28 
29  @classmethod
30  def set_empty(cls):
31  mtx = np.zeros((3, 3), dtype=np.float)
32  dist = []
33  return cls(mtx, dist)
34 
35  def __str__(self):
36  big_string = "mtx\n" + str(self.__mtx) + "\n"
37  big_string += "dist\n" + str(self.__dist) + "\n"
38  return big_string
39 
40  def get_center_position(self):
41  return tuple([self.__cx, self.__cy])
42 
43  def get_center_position_int(self):
44  return tuple([int(round(self.__cx)), int(round(self.__cy))])
45 
46  def get_intrinsic_parameters(self):
47  return {
48  "fx": self.__fx,
49  "fy": self.__fy,
50  "cx": self.__cx,
51  "cy": self.__cy,
52  }
53 
54  def get_cam_mtx_and_dist_coefs(self):
55  return self.__mtx, self.__dist
56 
57  def undistort_image(self, img):
58  return cv2.undistort(src=img, cameraMatrix=self.__mtx,
59  distCoeffs=self.__dist, newCameraMatrix=None)
60 
61  def meters_to_pixels(self, length, width, z_offset):
62  u = (length / z_offset) * self.__fx
63  v = (width / z_offset) * self.__fy
64 
65  return tuple([u, v])
66 
67  def get_camera_info(self):
68  """
69  Return value for ROS CameraInfo message
70  """
71  return self.__mtx, self.__dist
72 
73  def is_set(self):
74  return self.__fx != 0.0 and self.__fy != 0.0 and self.__cx != 0.0 and self.__cy != 0.0
